name: Divine Haste
description:
You are four monks trying to get to your temple by plane but unfortunately you crash. Can you fix it before the storm?

Divine Haste was made under 42 hours as a part of the annual Nordic Game Jam 2022

Our theme was : Weather

What you need to play: 4 controllers  

The people who worked on this game:

Programmers: Rune S∅nder, Nicklas Johansen Lið

Pixel artist: John Forsberg, Elias Ljung, Adam Nilsson

Music & sound artist: Adam Nilsson
